ComicInfo.Summary:
Tharg shows Alfie, a Wonder Comics reader and 2000 AD hater, around the offices of 2000 AD. Within mere minutes, Alfie's a convert.
Time-travelling big game hunters in an alternate universe wipe out mankind when one of them thoughtlessly kills a tree-dwelling lizard in the age of dinosaurs.
Brenner invites Clayton, who has the highest I.Q. in Britain, to take part in an experiment with his Dream Machine. Clayton's dream sends technician Williams over the edge and he tries to destroy the machine. Brenner tries again later, and this time Clayton's mind makes contact with some kind of extraterrestrial power.
Wyatt's pleasure cruiser is caught in a nuclear test in the Pacific. He is the only survivor. A year later he takes part in a cross-Atlantic yacht race, as the crisis in the Middle East heats up. Nuclear destruction hits deserted New York just as he sails past the Statue of Liberty.
Spek wakes up to find himself the game in a Safari Park floating in space. He dies when he has nowhere left to run and two Earthlings catch up with him. Tharg appears to warn us about what we are doing to our own planet's resources.
Warriors from the Karbongian Empire are told to go out and pillage until they reach the edge of the universe.
A man escapes from from a prison planet.
The army destroys an enemy spaceship filled with revolting octopus creatures but spares one with aliens that look like teddy bears.
A warrior fighting droids comes up against the Reaper of Death
A lonely space light-house keeper tells his computer to get rid of all the illusions it has created to keep him company.
Horoscope-obsessed actor McKinnon flees America after a computer predicts he will die on Fifth Avenue. The actor meets his fate, however, on a sound-stage in London done up to look like Fifth Avenue.
Cargo pilot flunks out on flight simulator.
During an Apollo mission in 1987 astronaut Jack Keller is captured by an alien who takes his form and leaves to join the Apollo crew with the intention of surveying the Earth. Keller does not believe the alien can pass himself off, until he meets a fellow captive - Neil Armstrong.
A man travels back into the past to prehistoric times.
An alien species overruns earth until they are stopped by themselves.
Space Miners get surprised when they try to mine a promising asteroid.
On the planet Lexor, Peron is a soldier who kills with his eyes. After defeating all his enemies, he collects his reward from the king.
The crew of the star ship Ajex encounters vampires and Rimmer is bitten and transformed into a vampire. He ravages through the crew until he is stopped by the cook.
Tex and Mitch land on a planet inhabited by lizard-like cowboys.
